methods.name: case_when
methods.docstring_summary: Concatenate a CASE WHEN clause to the query, created from a list of given property filters.

filters.description: A dict representing the set of properties to be filtered

on_true.description: The query to run when the predicate is true

on_false.description: The query to run when the predicate is false

ref_name.description: The name which is used to refer to the newly filtered object

comparison_operator.description: A string operator, according to which the comparison between property values is done, e.g. for "=", we get: property.name = property.value

boolean_operator.description: The boolean operator to apply between predicates
